meanings.definition: A medical condition in which tissue similar to the lining inside the uterus grows outside the uterus.
meanings.sent1: Endometriosis can cause severe pain for some women.
meanings.sent2: She was diagnosed with endometriosis after experiencing intense cramps.
meanings.sent3: Despite its name, endometriosis has nothing to do with the end of a story.
meanings.sent4: Her endometriosis felt like a garden growing where it shouldn't.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained endometriosis as a garden blooming in the wrong place.
